definitions.definition: an activity, such as a job, that a person uses physical or mental effort to do, usually for money:
examples: I've got so much work to do.

definitions.definition: the material used by someone at work, or what they produce:
examples: I'll have to take this work home with me and finish it there.
Her idea for reorganizing the department will never work in practice.

definitions.definition: used to refer to work of a particular type:
used to refer to a skill or activity using a particular type of material:
examples: Girls and boys study woodwork and metalwork at this school.

definitions.definition: used to name things made of a particular material:
